title: ryzaadit
author: ryzaadit
content: WEBSITE | WHITEPAPER | TOKENOMETRICS | $CCASH | TWITTER | TELEGRAM | DISCORD | INSTAGRAM | TWITCH | YOUTUBE

comments.author: CoinDelisi
comments.body: I have been following this project for a long time. Project of the Qorpo team. Successful team. I recommend you to follow this project.

comments.author: Murpheus
comments.body: Cryptocitizen is a triple A hero shooter P2E game, with immersive and impressive design, which anyone can confirm has not been seen before in the web3 community... Tbh this is a game everyone should be on the lookout for, alpha test is next month, and I wouldn't miss that for anything

comments.author: allisonkeya
comments.body: Wow! It seems like they are ready to launch. I will be the first person to try out their hero shooter game! I knew this project since Q1 this year

comments.author: windsilent
comments.body: It is necessary to closely follow the CryptoCitizen "Citizen Conflict" project, which is a part of the professionally working QORPO team, which is on its way to becoming a leader in its field.

comments.author: freakdust123
comments.body: Wow! I think it's a solid project! They have excellent graphics tho. It is truly on a high level. They have great backers and partners!

comments.author: IntheBeningging
comments.body: best game , I am excited on the coming alpha test.. we all better get readycitizen conflict a #web3 gaming with so deep storyline and very good graphics AAA made through #unrealengine5 for sure this game will be awesome.The team really make this happen, the beauty of its developments so far is really impeccable to see.. Excitement is coming, better be ready !

comments.author: daxkie
comments.body: This is it since the beginning till now this project consistent with the best concept and brings us unstoppable development #CitizenConflict can't wait to play the test game follow now and be ready guys

comments.author: Mvnzv
comments.body: The game and all the graphics looks amazing! If you need and spanish translator for in-game tests, announcements, images, the webpage or also spanish management IM OPEN TO WORK! I worked in various projects from 2017-2018 like Etheal, Tomochain, Indigo Racing, etc.
